ARABIC: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَيَمْحَقَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and so that Allah can purge those who have iman and wipe out the kafirun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is so that God may try the faithful and destroy the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and makes men go through trials in order that He might purge the believers and blot out those who deny the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: test the faith of the believers, and deprive the unbelievers of (His) blessings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And so that Allah may purify* the believers, and destroy the disbelievers. (* Forgive them their sins, if any.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that Allah may test those who believe and destroy the disbelievers..
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that He may purge those who believe and deprive the unbelievers of blessings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that God may prove the believers, and blot out the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that Allah may prove those who believe, and may blight the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so that God may purge those who believe and wipe out those who deny the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that Allah may purge those who believe and destroy the infidels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And so that Allah may purge [the hearts of] those who have faith and that He may wipe out the faithless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah's object also is to purge those that are true in Faith and to deprive of blessing Those that resist Faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that Allah may test (or purify) the believers (from sins) and destroy the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and so that Allah will examine those who believe and efface the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So that God may prove those who believe, and eliminate the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that Allah may purify the believers [through trials] and destroy the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:141] And that God may prove the believers, purifying them of sins through what befalls them, and efface, that is, destroy, the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that Allah may prove) may forgive (those who believe) for that which befalls them in jihad, (and may blight the disbelievers) and may destroy the unbelievers in war.
